page.title: 04THE PRAM RACE: A REPORT
page.content: The main attraction of Village Week was the{Pram Race}which certainly attracted the crowds. Competitors and spectators started gathering well before the start.{Two team members have to push a{third in a pram}around the course{drinking a half pint of {beer}at each of three pubs on the course. The tension was mounting as the start came nearer.The race started with the teams drinking a pint of beer and they were off down the road. Thirty minutes later the winners returned. We asked the competitors some questions.They said Tadworth Village Week is a good idea and they hope it will be the same every year it is on. {Everyone who was there said how {much they had enjoyed themselves.
